name: Inflict Wounds
description: A creature you touch makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 2d10 Necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
higherLevelsDescription: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.

effects.special: Target takes half damage on a successful save.

engineHook.notes: Requires target selection and damage application on failed/successful save.
